creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: view into a small plaza from a vantage under a barrel-vaulted colonnade; Classical style building elements; mounted to green paper
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash over black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: View of an Italian Colonnade and Courtyard
